summary: This document is a collection of email correspondence primarily involving Richard C. Curtiss making FOIA/PA requests to various government agencies (BOP, USSS, FBI) regarding inmate information and documents related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes procedural responses and a document delivery notification.

persons.name: Richard C Curtiss
persons.context: Individual making Freedom of Information Act and Privacy Act requests to the Bureau of Prisons, US Secret Service, and FBI regarding inmate information and documents related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of an FBI inquiry, with his inmate number (08448-055) referenced in a FOIA request to the Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Jeffrey Epstein as the subject of an FBI inquiry in correspondence.

events.title: FOIA Request to BOP Regarding Epstein
events.description: Richard C. Curtiss submits a FOIA/PA request to the Bureau of Prisons for information on inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate Number 08448-055). The request is directed to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: USSS Document Delivery for Request 20200877
events.description: The United States Secret Service notifies Richard C. Curtiss of document delivery details and a password for accessing 'Final Response' documents related to USSS request number 20200877.

events.title: FBI Buffalo Complaint Forwarding
events.description: The FBI Buffalo field office responds to an external email from Richard C. Curtiss regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, directing him to forward a complaint via an FBI tips link.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
Federal Bureau of Prisons, Office of General Counsel, Room 841, 320 First Street, N.W., Washington, D.C. 20534
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's Bureau of Prisons inmate number was 08448-055.
FOIA requests for information on Epstein were directed to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York and the BOP Office of General Counsel in Washington, D.C.
The United States Secret Service processed a document request (No. 20200877) related to Richard C. Curtiss's inquiries.
The FBI Buffalo field office was involved in handling a complaint or inquiry regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
